title: Respond to a Medical Emergency
description: A worker has been injured on the quay. The port's emergency response system must be activated.

tasks.description: Receive a radio call reporting an injured worker and their location.
tasks.expected_outcome: The control room operator receives the call and logs the emergency.

tasks.description: Dispatch the on-site paramedic team to the location.
tasks.expected_outcome: The port's first responders are dispatched.

tasks.description: Call the city's ambulance service and provide them with an escort to the scene.
tasks.expected_outcome: An ambulance is called, and a security vehicle is sent to the gate to escort it, ensuring a rapid response.
